column4: hello i'm recovering my ubuntu 11.10 i tried Shift  while booting , then i used grub, dpkg, clean recover then i go for resume set up it turns in terminal mode asking login and password after successful login, now i want  next procedure what to do to get login window to be appear
ah sorry I didn't see right, it was you directing a question to me, though I don't know why...
ok, me too, no problem, i just didn't see why that question would be more likely to be answered by me than someone else here... it doesn't look like anything I would know better...
